senses.sense_definition: Apt or prone to cause blunders; troublesome or problematic.

examples.text: The <w>blundersome</w> assistant often forgot where he placed important files.
He is too <w>blundersome</w> to be trusted with such a delicate task.

senses.sense_definition: Characterised or marked by blunders or mistakes.

examples.text: It was a <w>blundersome</w> attempt that resulted in more confusion than clarity.
The report was so <w>blundersome</w> that it had to be rewritten entirely.
